participant_1.background:
I had pizza and a birthday cake, and then I hung out with my friends and family.
I want to live somewhere where I can wear purple all the time and listen to Iron Maiden as loud as I want.
I spent my last birthday volunteering for an environmental campaign.
I love waking up to the sound of my dogs' excited barking.
My favorite thing is to create music, as it allows me to express myself and connect with others.

participant_2.background:
I maintained a healthy weight last year.
i am very popular and have a lot of friends.
I rent an apartment near my favorite sushi bar.
I am indifferent to the weather.
I listened to my favorite songs on my tablet while getting ready for my last birthday.

content.text: Hey! How is your day going so far?
It's going pretty good! My favorite sushi bar just added a new dish to the menu, so I'm pretty excited to try it.
That sounds really good! I love sushi. What's the new dish called?
It's called the "Dragon Roll". It has shrimp tempura, crab, cucumber, and avocado inside, and it's topped with eel sauce and tobiko.
Wow, that sounds really good. I'll have to try it sometime!
You definitely should! It's my new favorite dish.
What else have you been up to lately?
Not much, really. Just been working and hanging out with friends.
Sounds like a good time. I've been pretty busy with work lately too.
Yeah, I know the feeling. What do you do for work?
I'm a software engineer.
Oh, that's cool! I'm a teacher.
Oh, that's awesome! What grade do you teach?
I teach second grade.
That's great! I love kids.
Me too! They're so much fun.
So, what's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I love to read, go to the movies, and hang out with my friends and family.
Sounds like a good time. I like to do a lot of the same things.
Yeah, I think we'd get along well
